comment.author: 15283643@N04
comment._content: The name-plate on the conning tower reads, "FARFADET." This is either the submarine "Farfadet," which sank at the entrance of the port of Sidi Abdallah in Tunis on July 6th, 1905 (salvaged, refloated, and recommissioned as the "Follet" in 1909), or the name-plate indicates this is a Farfadet-class submarine.

comment.author: 41675580@N08
comment._content: A very nice old submarine picture.
